power.title: Adaptive Stratagem
power.fluff: Your companion has the ability and the will, and you provide the plan and the motivation

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target ally gains his or her choice of one of the following two benefits:
► A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
► A power bonus to saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Aid the Injured
power.fluff: Your presence is both a comfort and an inspiration to an ally

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
If the target ally is prone, he or she can stand up without spending an action.

power.title: Covering Maneuver
power.fluff: Responding to your expertise, one ally steps in to cover another's recovery

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally in your warlord's aura uses second wind

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering character, and one other ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The second ally can shift 2 squares as a free interrupt, and then marks one enemy either adjacent to him or her, or in your warlord's aura.
Until the start of his or her next turn, the triggering character has a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the marked enemy.

power.title: Crescendo of Violence
power.fluff: When one of your allies delivers a telling blow on a foe, you offer encouragement to help your friend keep fighting

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally in your warlord's aura scores a critical hit

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Cunning Adjustment
power.fluff: You spot an opening that can be seized to gain an advantage

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee attack, or the target ally of your tactician's command hits an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: You if you are adjacent to the triggering ally, or an ally adjacent to the triggering character

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can shift 3 squares as a free reaction, and gains combat advantage against the enemy that was hit by the triggering attack. The combat advantage lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Encouraging Boost
power.fluff: You shout words of encouragement, giving your ally a necessary boost

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can use his or her second wind as a free reaction.
If you have hit an enemy with an attack this turn, the target regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 4 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 8 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Flash of Insight
power.fluff: Your weapon slips past a foe's guard, allowing you to adjust your attack and throw the creature off balance

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a Weapon attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You either knock the triggering enemy prone, or push it a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Hasty Alert
power.fluff: Your shout warns comrades of imminent danger in time for them to react

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A surprise round begins, and you are conscious

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is not surprised, and gainst a bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of his or her next turn. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Heroic Example
power.fluff: On the brink of exhaustion, you still manage to rally your allies

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, allies in your warlord's aura gain a bonus to damage rolls while you are bloodied. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Inspired Belligerence
power.fluff: You lead your allies to use an enemy's defensive openings to deliver more punishment

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy in the burst granting combat advantage to you or an ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have combat advantage against the target.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: Choose one defense. Allies also have a power bonus to that defense against the target while they have the combat advantage. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: Allies also have a power bonus to all defenses against the target while they have the combat advantage. The bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: Allies's movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target while they have the combat advantage.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: Allies also gain a bonus to damage rolls with attacks only targeting the target when they have the combat advantage. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Knight's Move
power.fluff: With a sharp wave of your arm, you direct one of your allies to a more tactically advantageous position

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can take a move action as a free reaction.

power.title: Martial Cascade
power.fluff: Your daring attack inspires an ally to follow your lead

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each ally in the burst who can see you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the targets gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls they make against the triggering enemy during any extra action they gain by spending an action point.
If your triggering attack was a critical hit or you made the attack using an action gained by spending an action point, the targets also gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.

power.title: Motivated Recovery
power.fluff: At your encouragement, an injured ally exploits an opportunity to shine

section.name: Target:
section.text: One bloodied ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regainst the use of his or her second wind.
The target also gains a power bonus to the next attack roll he or she makes before the end of the encounter. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Repositioning Command
power.fluff: With a single word, your allies shift to more advantageus positions

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target can shift 2 squares.

power.title: Rub Some Dirt On It
power.fluff: With a wisecrack, you give your comrade a little courage despite his or her wounds

section.name: Target:
section.text: You if you're bloodied, or one bloodied ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 15 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Shake It Off
power.fluff: You offer strong words of encouragement to offset a debilitating effect

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, or one ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a saving throw, and has a power bonus to the roll equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Spur to Action
power.fluff: Sensing your enemies' advantage, you whisper quick orders that spur your allies to action

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Initiative is rolled

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target can choose to reroll his or her initiative, but must then use the second result.
